Package index

‘rgph’ package

Compute critical point pairings and persistent homology for Reeb graphs

rgph-package rgph
rgph: Pair Critical Points and Compute Persistent Homology of Reeb Graphs

Example Reeb graphs used to illustrate package tools

david buddha topology flower
Mesh-Derived Reeb Graphs

Class and coercers

An S3 class for Reeb graphs and converters with other graph classes

reeb_graph() print(<reeb_graph>) format(<reeb_graph>) read_reeb_graph()
An S3 class and constructors for Reeb graphs
as_reeb_graph() as_igraph() as_network()
Coerce objects to class reeb_graph
